DOC.brief_summary: The pneumoperitoneum laparoscopic surgery pediatrics potential cause increase intracranial pressure ( ICP ) . Therefore , study aim confirm increase ICP ultrasonographic measurement ONSD laparoscopic surgery pediatric patient .
